{{ character.name }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from '../core/services/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'], }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { characters: any[]; constructor(private apiService: ApiService) { this.characters = []; } ngOnInit(): void { this.apiService .getCharacters() .subscribe((response) => (this.characters = response)); } }
